articles.title: Alert issued in India after boy dies from high risk Nipah virus
articles.description: The virus is transmitted from animals such as pigs and fruit bats to humans.
articles.content:
Health authorities in India's Kerala state have issued an alert after a 14-year-old boy died of the Nipah virus.
